high_descs: Turn to the left to face the table.
Pick up the newspaper from the table.
Turn around to the left and walk to the side table that is to the left of the couch in the corner of the room.
Turn on the lamp that is on the side table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a newspaper.

high_descs: turn left to face the desk
pick up newspaper closest to you
turn around completely to face smaller desk move forward to desk
keep holding paper and turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: Pick up the newspaper and turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn left to face the table.
Pick up the newspaper on the table.
Turn around and step forward to face the lamp.
Turn on the lamp to examine the newspaper.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a newspaper and examine it under lamp light.
